name: Color Island
description:
Build your own world with your fingertips! A world of simple numbers becomes gorgeous in your hands with a simple touch.
What is your occupation? Students, doctors, scientists, freelancers? It does not matter! In this relaxed world you will be the greatest painter and designer! Oh, if you have children, or will have, don't forget to bring him to explore the world you built, and see how he draws a new world with his own little smart hands!
Game features
` dozens of colorful and exotic small worlds and hundreds of well-designed maps that make up them
` Simple and fast operation, you can build a beautiful little world by simply touching the numbers
` Cheerful and relaxed melody, every touch will be accompanied by crisp music
` Green snow mountains and rivers, small bridges and waters, colorful world, all is in your hands
` Nearly unlimited paint buckets, you can easily enjoy the game as long as you wait for a while.
Although 《Color Island》 is a free game, items in the game can also be purchased in real money. If you don't want to use this option, just turn it off in the device's Access Restrictions menu.
Like 《Color Island》, don't forget the five-star praise!
